original: Majjhima Nikāya 13
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Mahādukkhakkhandhasutta
analyzed: mahādukkhakkhandhasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya sāvatthim piṇḍāya pāvisisu

original: Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho tesam bhikkhūnam etat ahosi

original: “atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya carituṁ,
analyzed: atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyam piṇḍāya caritu

original: yaṁ nūna mayaṁ yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: yam nūna mayam yena añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam ārāmo tena upasaṅkameyyāma ati

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu;
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū yena añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam ārāmaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā tehi añña titthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhim sammodisu

original: sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinne kho te bhikkhū te añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ etat avocuḥ

original: “samaṇo, āvuso, gotamo kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapeti, mayampi kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapema;
analyzed: samaṇaḥ āvuso gotamaḥ kāmānam pariññam paññapeti mayam pi kāmānam pariññam paññapema

original: samaṇo, āvuso, gotamo rūpānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapeti, mayampi rūpānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapema;
analyzed: samaṇaḥ āvuso gotamaḥ rūpānam pariññam paññapeti mayam pi rūpānam pariññam paññapema

original: samaṇo, āvuso, gotamo vedanānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapeti, mayampi vedanānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapema;
analyzed: samaṇaḥ āvuso gotamaḥ vedanānam pariññam paññapeti mayam pi vedanānam pariññam paññapema

original: idha no, āvuso, ko viseso, ko adhippayāso, kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākaṁ vā—
analyzed: idha no āvuso kaḥ visesaḥ kaḥ adhippayāsaḥ kim nānākaraṇam samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākam vā

original: yadidaṁ dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesanaṁ, anusāsaniyā vā anusāsanin”ti?
analyzed: yat idam dhamma desanāya vā dhamma desana anusāsaniyā vā anusāsanin ti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ bhāsitaṁ neva abhinandiṁsu, nappaṭikkosiṁsu;
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū tesam añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam bhāsitam na iva abhinandisu na paṭikkosisu

original: anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁsu:
analyzed: an abhinanditvā a paṭikkositvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkamisu

original: “bhagavato santike etassa bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājānissāmā”ti.
analyzed: bhagavato santike etassa bhāsitassa attham ājānissāma ati

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū sāvatthiyam piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantā

original: yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “idha mayaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisimha.
analyzed: idha bhante pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya sāvatthim piṇḍāya pāvisimha

original: Tesaṁ no, bhante, amhākaṁ etadahosi:
analyzed: tesam naḥ bhante amhākam etat ahosi

original: ‘atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya carituṁ,
analyzed: atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyam piṇḍāya caritu

original: yaṁ nūna mayaṁ yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyāmā’ti.
analyzed: yam nūna mayam yena añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam ārāmo tena upasaṅkameyyāma ati

original: Atha kho mayaṁ, bhante, yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkamimha; upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṁ sammodimha;
analyzed: atha kho bhante yena añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam ārāmaḥ tena upasaṅkamimha upasaṅkamitvā tehi añña titthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhim sammodimha

original: sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdimha. Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho amhe, bhante, te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdimha ekamantam nisinne kho amhe bhante te añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ etat avocuḥ

original: ‘samaṇo, āvuso, gotamo kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapeti, mayampi kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapema.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ āvuso gotamaḥ kāmānam pariññam paññapeti mayam pi kāmānam pariññam paññapema

original: Samaṇo, āvuso, gotamo rūpānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapeti, mayampi rūpānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapema.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ āvuso gotamaḥ rūpānam pariññam paññapeti mayam pi rūpānam pariññam paññapema

original: Samaṇo, āvuso, gotamo vedanānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapeti, mayampi vedanānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapema.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ āvuso gotamaḥ vedanānam pariññam paññapeti mayam pi vedanānam pariññam paññapema

original: Idha no, āvuso, ko viseso, ko adhippayāso, kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākaṁ vā, yadidaṁ dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesanaṁ anusāsaniyā vā anusāsanin’ti.
analyzed: idha no āvuso kaḥ visesaḥ kaḥ adhippayāsaḥ kim nānākaraṇam samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākam vā yat idam dhamma desanāya vā dhamma desanam anusāsaniyā vā anusāsaninti

original: Atha kho mayaṁ, bhante, tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ bhāsitaṁ neva abhinandimha, nappaṭikkosimha;
analyzed: atha kho maya bhante tesam añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam bhāsitam na iva abhinandimha na paṭikkosimha

original: anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamimha:
analyzed: an abhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkamimha

original: ‘bhagavato santike etassa bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājānissāmā’”ti.
analyzed: bhagavato santike etassa bhāsitassa attham ājānissāma ati

original: “Evaṁvādino, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evamassu vacanīyā:
analyzed: eva vādinaḥ bhikkhave añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ evam assu vacanīyāḥ

original: ‘ko panāvuso, kāmānaṁ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kaḥ pana āvuso kāmānam assādaḥ kaḥ ādīnavaḥ kim nissaraṇa

original: Ko rūpānaṁ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kaḥ rūpānam assādaḥ kaḥ ādīnavaḥ kim nissaraṇa

original: Ko vedanānaṁ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan’ti?
analyzed: kaḥ vedanānam assādaḥ kaḥ ādīnavaḥ kim nissaraṇan ti

original: Evaṁ puṭṭhā, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā na ceva sampāyissanti, uttariñca vighātaṁ āpajjissanti.
analyzed: evam puṭṭhāḥ bhikkhave añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ na ca iva sampāyissanti uttarim ca vighātam āpajjissanti

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Yathā taṁ, bhikkhave, avisayasmiṁ.
analyzed: yathā ta bhikkhave

original: Nāhaṁ taṁ, bhikkhave, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā
analyzed: na aham ta bhikkhave passāmi sa devake loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇiyā

original: pajāya sadevamanussāya yo imesaṁ pañhānaṁ veyyākaraṇena cittaṁ ārādheyya, aññatra
analyzed: pajāya sa deva manussāya yaḥ imesam pañhānam veyyākaraṇena cittam ārādheyya aññatra

original: tathāgatena vā tathāgatasāvakena vā, ito vā pana sutvā.
analyzed: tathāgatena vā tathāgata sāvakena vā itas vā pana sutvā

original: Ko ca, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ assādo?
analyzed: kaḥ ca bhikkhave kāmānam assādaḥ

original: Pañcime, bhikkhave, kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: pañcime bhikkhave kāma guṇāḥ

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
analyzed: cakkhu viññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya rūpā kāma upasahitā rajanīyā

original: sotaviññeyyā saddā …pe…
analyzed: sota viññeyyā saddāḥ pe

original: ghānaviññeyyā gandhā …
analyzed: ghāna viññeyyāḥ gandhāḥ

original: jivhāviññeyyā rasā …
analyzed: jivhā viññeyyāḥ rasāḥ

original: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā—
analyzed: kāya viññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya rūpā kāma upasahitā rajanīyā

original: ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave pañca kāmaguṇā

original: Yaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—ayaṁ kāmānaṁ assādo.
analyzed: yam kho bhikkhave ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukham somanassa ayam kāmānam assādaḥ

original: Ko ca, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ ādīnavo?
analyzed: kaḥ ca bhikkhave kāmānam ādīnavaḥ

original: Idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṁ kappeti—
analyzed: idha bhikkhave kula puttaḥ yena sippa ṭṭhānena jīvikam kappeti

original: yadi muddāya yadi gaṇanāya yadi saṅkhānena yadi kasiyā yadi vaṇijjāya yadi gorakkhena yadi issatthena yadi rājaporisena yadi sippaññatarena—
analyzed: yadi muddāya yadi gaṇanāya yadi saṅkhānena yadi kasiyā yadi vaṇijjāya yadi gorakkhena yadi issatthena yadi rāja porisena yadi sippaññatarena

original: sītassa purakkhato uṇhassa purakkhato ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassehi rissamāno khuppipāsāya mīyamāno;
analyzed: sītassa purakkhataḥ uṇhassa purakkhataḥ ḍasama kasa vāta ātapa sarīsapa samphassehi rissamānaḥ khuppipāsāya mīyamānaḥ

original: ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko, dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave kāmānam ādīnavaḥ sandiṭṭhikaḥ dukkha kkhandhaḥ kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu

original: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa evaṁ uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato te bhogā nābhinipphajjanti.
analyzed: tassa ce bhikkhave kula puttassa evam uṭṭhahataḥ ghaṭataḥ vā āyamataḥ te bhogāḥ na abhinipphajjanti

original: So socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati:
analyzed: saḥ socati kilamati paridevati uras tāḷim kandati sammoham āpajjati

original: ‘moghaṁ vata me uṭṭhānaṁ, aphalo vata me vāyāmo’ti.
analyzed: mogham vata me uṭṭhāna aphalaḥ vata me vāyāmaḥ iti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave kāmānam ādīnavaḥ sandiṭṭhikaḥ dukkha kkhandhaḥ kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu

original: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa evaṁ uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato te bhogā abhinipphajjanti.
analyzed: tassa ce bhikkhave kula puttassa evam uṭṭhahataḥ ghaṭataḥ vā āyamataḥ te bhogāḥ abhinipphajjanti

original: So tesaṁ bhogānaṁ ārakkhādhikaraṇaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti:
analyzed: so tesam bhogānam ārakkha adhikaraṇam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: ‘kinti me bhoge neva rājāno hareyyuṁ, na corā hareyyuṁ, na aggi daheyya, na udakaṁ vaheyya, na appiyā dāyādā hareyyun’ti.
analyzed: kinti me bhoge na iva rājānaḥ hareyyu na corāḥ hareyyu na aggi daheyya na udakam vaheyya na appiyāḥ dāyādāḥ hareyyunti

original: Tassa evaṁ ārakkhato gopayato te bhoge rājāno vā haranti, corā vā haranti, aggi vā dahati, udakaṁ vā vahati, appiyā vā dāyādā haranti.
analyzed: tassa evam ārakkhataḥ gopayataḥ te bhoge rājānaḥ vā haranti corāḥ vā haranti aggi vā dahati udakam vā vahati appiyāḥ vā dāyādāḥ haranti

original: So socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati:
analyzed: saḥ socati kilamati paridevati uras tāḷim kandati sammoham āpajjati

original: ‘yampi me ahosi tampi no natthī’ti.
analyzed: yam pi me ahosi tam pi no natthi iti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko, dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave kāmānam ādīnavaḥ sandiṭṭhikaḥ dukkha kkhandhaḥ kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu rājānopi
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu rājānaḥ api

original: rājūhi vivadanti, khattiyāpi khattiyehi vivadanti, brāhmaṇāpi brāhmaṇehi vivadanti,
analyzed: rājūhi vivadanti khattiyā api khattiyehi vivadanti brāhmaṇā api brāhmaṇehi vivadanti

original: gahapatīpi gahapatīhi vivadanti, mātāpi puttena vivadati, puttopi mātarā vivadati,
analyzed: gahapatī ipi gahapatīhi vivadanti mātā api puttena vivadati puttaḥ api mātarā vivadati

original: pitāpi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitarā vivadati, bhātāpi bhātarā vivadati, bhātāpi
analyzed: pitā api puttena vivadati puttaḥ api pitarā vivadati bhātā api bhātarā vivadati bhātā api

original: bhaginiyā vivadati, bhaginīpi bhātarā vivadati, sahāyopi sahāyena vivadati.
analyzed: bhaginiyā vivadati bhaginī ipi bhātarā vivadati sahāyaḥ upi sahāyena vivadati

original: Te tattha kalahaviggahavivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ pāṇīhipi upakkamanti, leḍḍūhipi upakkamanti, daṇḍehipi upakkamanti, satthehipi upakkamanti.
analyzed: te tattha kalaha viggaha vivāda āpannāḥ aññamaññam pāṇīhi pi upakkamanti leḍḍūhi pi upakkamanti daṇḍehi pi upakkamanti satthehi pi upakkamanti

original: Te tattha maraṇampi nigacchanti, maraṇamattampi dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: te tattha maraṇam pi nigacchanti maraṇa mattam pi dukkha

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko, dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave kāmānam ādīnavaḥ sandiṭṭhikaḥ dukkha kkhandhaḥ kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu asicammaṁ
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu asi camma

original: gahetvā, dhanukalāpaṁ sannayhitvā, ubhatobyūḷhaṁ saṅgāmaṁ pakkhandanti usūsupi khippamānesu,
analyzed: gahetvā dhanu kalāpam sannayhitvā ubhatobyūḷham saṅgāmam pakkhandanti usūsupi khippamānesu

original: sattīsupi khippamānāsu, asīsupi vijjotalantesu.
analyzed: sattīsupi khippamānāsu asīsupi

original: Te tattha usūhipi vijjhanti, sattiyāpi vijjhanti, asināpi sīsaṁ chindanti.
analyzed: te tattha usūhi api vijjhanti sattiyā api vijjhanti asinā api sīsam chindanti

original: Te tattha maraṇampi nigacchanti, maraṇamattampi dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: te tattha maraṇam pi nigacchanti maraṇa mattam pi dukkha

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko, dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave kāmānam ādīnavaḥ sandiṭṭhikaḥ dukkha kkhandhaḥ kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu asicammaṁ
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu asi camma

original: gahetvā, dhanukalāpaṁ sannayhitvā, addāvalepanā upakāriyo pakkhandanti usūsupi khippamānesu,
analyzed: gahetvā dhanu kalāpam sannayhitvā addāva lepanāḥ upakāriyaḥ pakkhandanti usūsu pi khippamānesu

original: sattīsupi khippamānāsu, asīsupi vijjotalantesu.
analyzed: sattīsupi khippamānāsu asīsupi

original: Te tattha usūhipi vijjhanti, sattiyāpi vijjhanti, chakaṇakāyapi osiñcanti, abhivaggenapi omaddanti, asināpi sīsaṁ chindanti.
analyzed: te tattha usūhi api vijjhanti sattiyā api vijjhanti chakaṇakāya api osiñcanti abhivaggena api omaddanti asinā api sīsam chindanti

original: Te tattha maraṇampi nigacchanti, maraṇamattampi dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: te tattha maraṇam pi nigacchanti maraṇa mattam pi dukkha

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko, dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave kāmānam ādīnavaḥ sandiṭṭhikaḥ dukkha kkhandhaḥ kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu sandhimpi
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu sandhim pi

original: chindanti, nillopampi haranti, ekāgārikampi karonti, paripanthepi tiṭṭhanti, paradārampi gacchanti.
analyzed: chindanti nillopam pi haranti ekāgārikam pi karonti paripanthe pi tiṭṭhanti paradāram pi gacchanti

original: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārenti—
analyzed: tam enam rājānaḥ gahetvā vividhā kamma kāraṇā kārenti

original: kasāhipi tāḷenti, vettehipi tāḷenti, aḍḍhadaṇḍakehipi tāḷenti; hatthampi chindanti,
analyzed: kasāhi pi tāḷenti vettehi pi tāḷenti aḍḍhadaṇḍakehi pi tāḷenti hattham pi chindanti

original: pādampi chindanti, hatthapādampi chindanti, kaṇṇampi chindanti, nāsampi chindanti,
analyzed: pādam pi chindanti hattha pādam pi chindanti kaṇṇam pi chindanti nāsam pi chindanti

original: kaṇṇanāsampi chindanti; bilaṅgathālikampi karonti, saṅkhamuṇḍikampi karonti, rāhumukhampi
analyzed: kaṇṇa nāsam chindanti bilaṅga thālikam pi karonti saṅkha muṇḍikam pi karonti rāhumukham pi

original: karonti, jotimālikampi karonti, hatthapajjotikampi karonti, erakavattikampi karonti,
analyzed: karonti joti mālikam pi karonti hattha pajjotikam pi karonti eraka vattikam pi karonti

original: cīrakavāsikampi karonti, eṇeyyakampi karonti, baḷisamaṁsikampi karonti, kahāpaṇikampi
analyzed: cīrakavāsikam pi karonti eṇeyyakam pi karonti baḷisamasikam pi karonti kahāpaṇikam pi

original: karonti, khārāpatacchikampi karonti, palighaparivattikampi karonti, palālapīṭhakampi
analyzed: karonti khārāpatacchikam pi karonti paligha parivattikam pi karonti palāla pīṭhakam pi

original: karonti, tattenapi telena osiñcanti, sunakhehipi khādāpenti, jīvantampi sūle uttāsenti,
analyzed: karonti tat tena api telena osiñcanti sunakhehi khādāpenti jīvantam pi sūle uttāsenti

original: asināpi sīsaṁ chindanti.
analyzed: asinā api sīsam chindanti

original: Te tattha maraṇampi nigacchanti, maraṇamattampi dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: te tattha maraṇam pi nigacchanti maraṇa mattam pi dukkha

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ ādīnavo sandiṭṭhiko, dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave kāmānam ādīnavaḥ sandiṭṭhikaḥ dukkha kkhandhaḥ kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu kāyena duccaritaṁ caranti, vācāya duccaritaṁ caranti, manasā duccaritaṁ caranti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu kāyena duccaritam caranti vācāya duccaritam caranti manasā duccaritam caranti

original: Te kāyena duccaritaṁ caritvā, vācāya duccaritaṁ caritvā, manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā, kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
analyzed: te kāyena duccaritam caritvā vācāya duccaritam caritvā manasā duccaritam caritvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjanti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ ādīnavo samparāyiko, dukkhakkhandho kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ kāmādhikaraṇaṁ kāmānameva hetu.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave kāmānam ādīnavaḥ samparāyikaḥ dukkha kkhandhaḥ kāma hetu kāma nidānam kāma adhikaraṇam kāmānam eva hetu

original: Kiñca, bhikkhave, kāmānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiñca bhikkhave kāmānam nissaraṇa

original: Yo kho, bhikkhave, kāmesu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ—idaṁ kāmānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ kho bhikkhave kāmesu chanda rāga vinayaḥ chanda rāga ppahānā edam kāmānam nissaraṇa

original: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ kāmānaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca
analyzed: ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā evam kāmānam assādam ca assādataḥ ādīnavam ca

original: ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti te vata sāmaṁ vā kāme
analyzed: ādīnavataḥ nissaraṇam ca nissaraṇataḥ yathābhūtam na ppajānanti te vata sāmam vā kāme

original: parijānissanti, paraṁ vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipanno kāme parijānissatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: parijānissanti param vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipannaḥ kāme parijānissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ kāmānaṁ assādañca assādato
analyzed: ye ca kho keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā evam kāmānam assādam ca assādato

original: ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti, te vata sāmaṁ
analyzed: ādīnavam ca ādīnavataḥ nissaraṇam ca nissaraṇataḥ yathābhūtam pajānanti te vata sāma

original: vā kāme parijānissanti paraṁ vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipanno kāme parijānissatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vā kāme parijānissanti param vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipannaḥ kāme parijānissati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: Ko ca, bhikkhave, rūpānaṁ assādo?
analyzed: kaḥ ca bhikkhave rūpānam assādaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, khattiyakaññā vā brāhmaṇakaññā vā gahapatikaññā vā pannarasavassuddesikā
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave khattiya kaññā vā brāhmaṇa kaññā vā gahapati kaññā vā pannarasa vassuddesikā

original: vā soḷasavassuddesikā vā, nātidīghā nātirassā nātikisā nātithūlā nātikāḷī nāccodātā
analyzed: vā soḷasa vassuddesikā vā na ati dīghā na ati rassā na ati kisā na ati thūlā na ati kāḷī na accodātā

original: paramā sā, bhikkhave, tasmiṁ samaye subhā vaṇṇanibhāti?
analyzed: paramā sā bhikkhave tasmin samaye subhā vaṇṇa nibhā ati

original: ‘Evaṁ, bhante’.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: Yaṁ kho, bhikkhave, subhaṁ vaṇṇanibhaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
analyzed: yam kho bhikkhave subham vaṇṇa nibham paṭicca uppajjati sukham somanassa

original: ayaṁ rūpānaṁ assādo.
analyzed: ayam rūpānam assādaḥ

original: Ko ca, bhikkhave, rūpānaṁ ādīnavo?
analyzed: kaḥ ca bhikkhave rūpānaṃ ādīnavaḥ

original: Idha, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginiṁ passeyya aparena samayena āsītikaṁ vā nāvutikaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhave tam eva bhaginim passeyya aparena samayena āsītikam vā nāvutika

original: vā vassasatikaṁ vā jātiyā, jiṇṇaṁ gopānasivaṅkaṁ bhoggaṁ daṇḍaparāyanaṁ pavedhamānaṁ
analyzed: vā vassa satikam vā jātiyā jiṇṇam gopānasi vaṅkam bhoggam daṇḍa parāyanam

original: gacchantiṁ āturaṁ gatayobbanaṁ khaṇḍadantaṁ palitakesaṁ, vilūnaṁ khalitasiraṁ valinaṁ tilakāhatagattaṁ.
analyzed: āturam gata yobbanam khaṇḍa dantam palita kesa vilūnam khalita siram valinam

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

original: yā purimā subhā vaṇṇanibhā sā antarahitā, ādīnavo pātubhūtoti?
analyzed: yā purimā subhā vaṇṇa nibhā sā antarahitā ādīnavaḥ pātubhūtā iti

original: ‘Evaṁ, bhante’.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, rūpānaṁ ādīnavo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave rūpānaṃ ādīnavaḥ

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginiṁ passeyya ābādhikaṁ dukkhitaṁ bāḷhagilānaṁ, sake muttakarīse palipannaṁ semānaṁ, aññehi vuṭṭhāpiyamānaṁ, aññehi saṁvesiyamānaṁ.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave tam eva bhaginim passeyya ābādhikam dukkhitam bāḷha gilāna sake mutta karīse palipannam semāna aññehi vuṭṭhāpiyamāna aññehi sa vesiyamāna

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

original: yā purimā subhā vaṇṇanibhā sā antarahitā, ādīnavo pātubhūtoti?
analyzed: yā purimā subhā vaṇṇa nibhā sā antarahitā ādīnavaḥ pātubhūtā iti

original: ‘Evaṁ, bhante’.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, rūpānaṁ ādīnavo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave rūpānaṃ ādīnavaḥ

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginiṁ passeyya sarīraṁ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṁ—

analyzed: eka aha matam vā dvīha matam vā tīha matam vā uddhumātakam vinīlakam vipubbaka jāta

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

analyzed: yā purimā subhā vaṇṇa nibhā sā antarahitā ādīnavaḥ pātubhūtā iti

analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave rūpānaṃ ādīnavaḥ

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginiṁ passeyya sarīraṁ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṁ—
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave tam eva bhaginim passeyya sarīram sivathikāya chaḍḍita

analyzed: kākehi vā khajjamāna kulalehi vā khajjamāna gijjhehi vā khajjamāna kaṅkehi

analyzed: siṅgālehi vā khajjamāna vividhehi vā pāṇaka jātehi khajjamāna

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave, yā purimā subhā vaṇṇanibhā sā antarahitā, ādīnavo pātubhūtoti?
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave yā purimā subhā vaṇṇa nibhā sā antarahitā ādīnavaḥ pātubhūtaḥ ti

analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave rūpānaṃ ādīnavaḥ

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginiṁ passeyya sarīraṁ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṁ—
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave tam eva bhaginim passeyya sarīram sivathikāya chaḍḍita

original: aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ samaṁsalohitaṁ nhārusambandhaṁ, aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ nimaṁsalohitamakkhitaṁ
analyzed: aṭṭhika saṅkhalikam samasa lohitam nhāru sambandha aṭṭhika saṅkhalikam

analyzed: nhāru sambandha aṭṭhika saṅkhalikam apagata masa lohitam nhāru sambandha aṭṭhikāni

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave, yā purimā subhā vaṇṇanibhā sā antarahitā, ādīnavo pātubhūtoti?
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave yā purimā subhā vaṇṇa nibhā sā antarahitā ādīnavaḥ pātubhūtaḥ ti

original: ‘Evaṁ, bhante’.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, rūpānaṁ ādīnavo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave rūpānaṃ ādīnavaḥ

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginiṁ passeyya sarīraṁ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṁ—
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave tam eva bhaginim passeyya sarīram sivathikāya chaḍḍita

original: aṭṭhikāni setāni saṅkhavaṇṇapaṭibhāgāni, aṭṭhikāni puñjakitāni terovassikāni, aṭṭhikāni pūtīni cuṇṇakajātāni.
analyzed: aṭṭhikāni setāni saṅkha vaṇṇa paṭibhāgāni aṭṭhikāni puñjakitāni terovassikāni aṭṭhikāni pūtīni cuṇṇaka jātāni

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

original: yā purimā subhā vaṇṇanibhā sā antarahitā, ādīnavo pātubhūtoti?
analyzed: yā purimā subhā vaṇṇa nibhā sā antarahitā ādīnavaḥ pātubhūtā iti

original: ‘Evaṁ, bhante’.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, rūpānaṁ ādīnavo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave rūpānaṃ ādīnavaḥ

original: Kiñca, bhikkhave, rūpānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiñca bhikkhave rūpānam

original: Yo, bhikkhave, rūpesu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ—idaṁ rūpānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhave rūpesu chanda rāga vinayaḥ chanda rāga ppahānā edam rūpānam nissaraṇa

original: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ rūpānaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca
analyzed: ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā evam rūpānam assādam ca assādataḥ ādīnavam ca

original: ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti te vata sāmaṁ vā rūpe
analyzed: ādīnavataḥ nissaraṇam ca nissaraṇataḥ yathābhūtam na ppajānanti te vata sāmam vā rūpe

original: parijānissanti, paraṁ vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipanno rūpe parijānissatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: parijānissanti param vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipannaḥ rūpe parijānissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ rūpānaṁ assādañca assādato
analyzed: ye ca kho keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā evam rūpānam assādam ca assādato

original: ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti te vata sāmaṁ
analyzed: ādīnavam ca ādīnavataḥ nissaraṇam ca nissaraṇataḥ yathābhūtam pajānanti te vata sāma

original: vā rūpe parijānissanti paraṁ vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipanno rūpe parijānissatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vā rūpe parijānissanti param vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipannaḥ rūpe parijānissati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: Ko ca, bhikkhave, vedanānaṁ assādo?
analyzed: kaḥ ca bhikkhave vedanānam assādaḥ

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi

original: savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, neva tasmiṁ
analyzed: sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati na iva tasmin

original: samaye attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, na parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, na ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti;
analyzed: samaye atta byābādhāya api ceta iti na para byābādhāya api ceta iti na ubhaya byābādhāya api ceta iti

original: abyābajjhaṁyeva tasmiṁ samaye vedanaṁ vedeti.
analyzed: tasmin samaye vedanam veda iti

original: Abyābajjhaparamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, vedanānaṁ assādaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: a byābajjha param āha bhikkhave vedanānam assādam vadāmi

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu vitakka vicārānam vūpasamā ajjhattam sampasādana

original: cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati …pe…
analyzed: cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvam a vitakkam a vicāram samādhi jam pīti sukham dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati pe

original: yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā, upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca

original: sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satimā
analyzed: sampajānaḥ sukham ca kāyena paṭisavedeti yam tam ariyāḥ ācikkhanti upekkhakaḥ satimā

original: sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati …pe…
analyzed: sukha vihārī iti tatiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati pe

original: yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbā eva

original: somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ
analyzed: somanassa domanassānam atthaṅgamāḥ adukkham asukham upekkhā sati pārisuddhim catuttha

original: jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, neva tasmiṁ samaye attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, na parabyābādhāyapi
analyzed: jhānam upasampajja viharati na iva tasmin samaye atta byābādhāya api cetā iti na para byābādhāya api

original: ceteti, na ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti;
analyzed: cetā iti na ubhaya byābādhāya api cetā iti

original: abyābajjhaṁyeva tasmiṁ samaye vedanaṁ vedeti.
analyzed: tasmin samaye vedanam veda iti

original: Abyābajjhaparamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, vedanānaṁ assādaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: a byābajjha param āha bhikkhave vedanānam assādam vadāmi

original: Ko ca, bhikkhave, vedanānaṁ ādīnavo?
analyzed: kaḥ ca bhikkhave vedanānaṃ ādīnavaḥ

original: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā—ayaṁ vedanānaṁ ādīnavo.
analyzed: yā bhikkhave vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāma dhammā ayam vedanānaṃ ādīnavaḥ

original: Kiñca, bhikkhave, vedanānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiñca bhikkhave vedanānam

original: Yo, bhikkhave, vedanāsu chandarāgavinayo, chandarāgappahānaṁ—idaṁ vedanānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhave vedanāsu chanda rāga vinayaḥ chanda rāga ppahānā edam vedanānam nissaraṇa

original: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ vedanānaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca
analyzed: ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā evam vedanānam assādam ca assādataḥ ādīnavam ca

original: ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti, te vata sāmaṁ vā vedanaṁ
analyzed: ādīnavataḥ nissaraṇam ca nissaraṇataḥ yathābhūtam na ppajānanti te vata sāmam vā

original: parijānissanti, paraṁ vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipanno vedanaṁ parijānissatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: parijānissanti param vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipannaḥ vedanam parijānissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ vedanānaṁ assādañca assādato
analyzed: ye ca kho keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā evam vedanānam assādam ca assādato

original: ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti te vata sāmaṁ
analyzed: ādīnavam ca ādīnavataḥ nissaraṇam ca nissaraṇataḥ yathābhūtam pajānanti te vata sāma

original: vā vedanaṁ parijānissanti, paraṁ vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipanno vedanaṁ
analyzed: vā vedanam parijānissanti param vā tathattāya samādapessanti yathā paṭipannaḥ vedana

original: parijānissatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjatī”ti.
analyzed: parijānissati itiṭhānam etam vijjati iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Mahādukkhakkhandhasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ tatiyaṁ.
analyzed: mahādukkhakkhandha suttam niṭṭhitam tatiya
